#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#define M 10000
using namespace std;

int main(void)
{
	long long t, n, temp1, temp2, i, j;
	long long cat[1002], s;

	cat[0] = 0;
	cat[1] = 1;
	cat[2] = 1;
	cat[3] = 2;
	cat[4] = 5;

	for (i = 5; i <= 1000; i++)
	{
		s = 0;
		for (j = 1; 2 * j < i; j++)
		{
			s = s + 2 * cat[j] * cat[i - j];
		}
		if (s >= 10000)
			s = s % 10000;
		if (i % 2 == 0)
			s = s + cat[i / 2] * cat[i / 2];
		cat[i] = s % 10000;
	}

	scanf("%lld", &t);

	while (t--)
	{
		scanf("%lld", &n);

		printf("%lld\n", cat[n]);
	}
	return 0;
}
